=Motivation=

Remove Mutations carried by more than/ less than 'x' samples

=Solution=

Use a 'Sample/Snp' Node

[https://knime4bio.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/SamplePerSnp01.png]

and use a 'Numeric Row Filter' filtering the new column 'sample.per.snp'

[https://knime4bio.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/SamplePerSnp02.png]
